text: "Bridge over Troubled Water" is a 1970 song by Simon & Garfunkel and is the title track to their fifth studio album Bridge over Troubled Water. The song won five Grammy Awards in 1971 and is their most successful song of all time. It topped the single charts in the United States, the United Kingdom, Canada, France, New Zealand and Indonesia. It has been covered by over 50 artists including Elvis Presley, Johnny Cash, Aretha Franklin and Willie Nelson. == Other websites == * Top 10 Simon & Garfunkel Songs == References == Category:1970 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Folk ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Folk rock songs Category:Simon & Garfunkel songs Category:Buck Owens songs Category:Bonnie Tyler songs Category:B.
